pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, June 26, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

10:30 a.m.  The Prime Minister will visit Big Rig Brewery, to highlight a business using the Canada Emergency Wage Subsidy, and supporting the community’s response to COVID-19 by producing hand sanitizer. A media availability will follow.

Big Rig Brewery
103 Schneider Road

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media to arrive no later than 9:45 am
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#
